title: Dear Rito
body:
Can you please remove Satan ({{champion:17}}) and any skins I have of Satan, from my account? I do not want a refund, keep the RP/IP i spent on Satan, could you just remove him.

Cheers

replies.body:
Hey Nothing Special,

You can submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and request for them to remove these from your account.

-DTN
